interfaces

Interface ConnectionBalancerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMI_Server_Balancer

    public interface ConnectionBalancerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The ConnectionBalancerInterface provides the user with services to perform initial operations to connect the client to Watchneighbours' server for logIn, subscription, access and subscription utils operations
    Author:
    Nicola Landro, Luca Landa

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String accessWithoutAccount(java.lang.String suburb, java.lang.String city)
      Access the application without an user account, in order to obtain reports and report updates of the specified suburb from server
      User confirmRegistration(java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String registrationCode)
      Confirms a user account registration
      boolean emailAvailable(java.lang.String email)
      Checks for an email address availability
      User logIn(java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String password)
      Executes a logIn operation
      boolean register(User newUser)
      Submits a new user account to Watchneighbours' server
      boolean userIDAvailable(java.lang.String userID)
      Checks for an user ID availability

    • Method Detail

      • logIn

        User logIn(java.lang.String userID,
           java.lang.String password)
    throws NotExistingUserIDException,
           WrongPasswordException,
           UserNotConfirmedException,
           java.rmi.RemoteException
        Executes a logIn operation
        Parameters:
        userID - the user account ID
        password - the user account password
        Returns:
        User the instance of connected user account
        Throws:
        NotExistingUserIDException - if the given ID has not been registered yet
        WrongPasswordException - if the given password is not correct
        UserNotConfirmedException - if the user has not been confirmed yet
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if cannot connect to Watchneighbours' sever

      • confirmRegistration

        User confirmRegistration(java.lang.String userID,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         java.lang.String registrationCode)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         WrongConfirmationCodeException,
                         NotExistingUserIDException,
                         WrongPasswordException,
                         UserNotConfirmedException
        Confirms a user account registration
        Parameters:
        userID - the user account ID
        password - the user account password
        registrationCode - the user confirmation code received as email
        Returns:
        the instance of connected user account
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if cannot connect to Watchneighbours' server
        WrongConfirmationCodeException - if the given confirmation code is wrong
        NotExistingUserIDException - if the given ID has not been registered yet
        WrongPasswordException - if the given password is not correct
        UserNotConfirmedException - in case of errors with the user confirmation operation

      • register

        boolean register(User newUser)
          throws WrongDataException,
                 java.rmi.RemoteException
        Submits a new user account to Watchneighbours' server
        Parameters:
        newUser - the user account submitted
        Returns:
        success of the operation
        Throws:
        WrongDataException - if the account submitted contains wrong data
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if cannot connect to Watchneighbours' server

        Returns:
        availability of the ID

      • accessWithoutAccount

        java.lang.String accessWithoutAccount(java.lang.String suburb,
                                      java.lang.String city)
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Access the application without an user account, in order to obtain reports and report updates of the specified suburb from server
        Parameters:
        suburb - the suburb of interest
        city - the city of interest
        Returns:
        name of the SubUrbInterface instance to look for on server's rmi registry
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if cannot connect to Watchneighbours' server
